definition: mark/sign/label/to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc/to bear (a brand name, registration number etc)/prize/award/bid/target/quota/(old) the topmost branches of a tree/visible symptom/classifier for military units

sentences.english: Chartplotters can perform many navigational tasks.
sentences.chinese: 海图标绘仪能执行许多种导航任务。

sentences.english: Zoning means the planning decisions which have been made and drawn out on maps .
sentences.chinese: 分区规划指已经做出且已标绘在地图上的规划决策。

sentences.english: Zoning means the planning decisions which have been made and drawn out on maps.
sentences.chinese: 分区规划指已经做出的规划决策，并已标绘在地图上。

sentences.english: Radar plotting is the basis of collision avoidance with radar.
sentences.chinese: 雷达标绘是雷达避碰的基础。

definition: to interpret (a visual document, a medical exam, an historical event etc)/to analyze data (from a chip, a black box etc)
to stake out (the boundaries of a property etc)/to demarcate/(engineering etc) to calibrate
